18.ara-name: كتاب الصيد والذبائح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin Mughaffal:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "If it were not that dogs were part of a nation among the nations, then I would order to that all of them be killed. So kill every one of them that is all black

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَتْلِ الْكِلاَبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Killing Dogs
